content: @T-release meeting!
@DPC -- triage update?
nothing much to report. A few prs piling up some of which are re-assigned
thanks!
let me know if I should help out reassigning or whatever
okay, moving on, we have no nominated or beta-nominated things to address
there is one stable nom (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73485) but it's a diagnostics fix I think
sure (the reports are in #t-release/triage in case anyone wants to review any of those prs or reassign them, feel free)
so not worth a .2 release
we also have the next stable relatively close
yep
so I'll leave a comment rejecting stable backport from t-release side, if you disagree please click the stop sign
It's an old bug apparently, so why would it be urgent enough for stable backport?
I think Esteban has been basically stable-nominating any stable-stable regressions? not sure
regression fixes, that is

okay, moving on -- we have an agenda today (!) beyond regular checkins

  • Move the pre-release announcement posts to inside rust, just posting a link on internals
    - “official team communication” feels like it belongs on inside rust, also maybe easier to syndicate exclusively (e.g. in RSS feeds or whatever)
this is something I was thinking about -- does anyone feel we shouldn't do this? it'll probably be a little more work to do so, I guess, but seems like "the thing to do"
I'm definitely in favor of this, the more content for the blog the better IMO.
It seems fine, but in general I feel like not many teams visit internals, which makes the forum less useful. It's not _really_ where internal discussion happens...
yeah, I agree with that -- there's too much going on internals to make it a good place for detailed discussion I think
but anyway, seems like no objections to this
Internals is a tough place to keep track of what's happening, so agreed
the blog post for 1.45 is being worked on by Steve, and I let him know that @BatmanAoD (Kyle Strand) is available to help out
@Elinvynia had mentioned privately in the past that they would like to volunteer on release notes blog post as well
I think this time it's my turn for the actual release?
@Pietro Albini hm yeah I think I did the last two (including point release)? Happy to have someone else do it of course :)
yeah sure I'll do it!
@DPC you mean blog post?
yeh
okay, well, we'll probably pop open a topic here to coordinate that once a draft is ready
does anyone have any other items to bring up?
we should archive the discord channel :D
hm I thought I had done that
Looks like I just need to move it
and maybe discuss if we are bringing rollups and crater channels here
or leaving them on discord
I'll do that after the meeting. I think rollups and crater are more t-infra personally
yeh :slight_smile:
(rollups less so perhaps)
Anything else?
sounds like no, thanks all for attending! :wave:
Sorry for seeing this so late I'm happy to help with anything release related :)
